org.contentmine.graphics.svg

Class SVGElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • nu.xom.Node
      • nu.xom.ParentNode
        • nu.xom.Element
          • org.contentmine.graphics.AbstractCMElement
            • org.contentmine.graphics.svg.GraphicsElement
              • org.contentmine.graphics.svg.SVGElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EuclidConstants, XMLConstants, SVGConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAnimate, AbstractSVGGradient, SVGClipPath, SVGDefs, SVGDesc, SVGG, SVGMarker, SVGPattern, SVGScript, SVGShape, SVGStop, SVGSVG, SVGSymbol, SVGText, SVGTitle, SVGUse

    public class SVGElement
extends GraphicsElement
    Base class for lightweight generic SVG element.

    No checking - i.e. can take any name or attributes.

    Author:
    pm286

      • setBoundingBoxCached

        public void setBoundingBoxCached(boolean boundingBoxCached)
        recalculation of bounding box. calculation of BBox can be time consuming. This asserts that the bbox will not change and the box can be re-used without recalculating. A crude form of memo-isation. Up to the caller to recalculate when the objects are likely to change.
        Parameters:
        boundingBoxCached -

      • setBoundingBoxCached

                                        boolean boundingBoxCached)

      • createMask

        public static RealRangeArray createMask(java.util.List<? extends SVGElement> elementList,
                                        RealRange.Direction direction)
        Creates a mask (list of RealRanges) that mirror the elements added Example SVGRect(new Real2(0., 10.), new Real2(30., 40.) SVGRect(new Real2(40., 10.), new Real2(50., 40.) SVGRect(new Real2(45., 10.), new Real2(55., 40.) creates a horizontal mask RealRange(0., 30.), RealRange(40., 55.),
        Parameters:
        elementList - elements to create mask
        Returns:
        RealRange array corresponding to (overlapped) ranges of elements

      • querySelfAndDescendantsForClass

        public java.util.List<SVGElement> querySelfAndDescendantsForClass(java.lang.String queryClass)
        query descendant tree for complete qords in class attribute. "foo" will match "foo junk", "junk foo", but not "foojunk" or "myfoo junk"
        Parameters:
        queryClass -
        Returns:

      • querySelfAndDescendantsForClass

        public java.util.List<SVGElement> querySelfAndDescendantsForClass(java.lang.String attName,
                                                                  java.lang.String value)
        query descendant tree for attribute attName with given value(s). typical attNames are "id" and "class" this allows searching for whitespace-separated values, e.g. class="foo bar" will be matched by value = "foo" or "bar but not "foobar", or "myfoo"
        Parameters:
        attName -
        queryClass -
        Returns:
